Carmichael (Charles A.) Letter To His Brother

did.unittitle: Charles A. Carmichael letter to his brother
did.abstract: Photocopy letter, with typescript, from Charles A. Carmichael to his brother, 4 pp, 15 November 1850, regarding a trip west and settlement in Oregon.

originalsloc.p: Office of the County Clerk, Shasta County Courthouse;Redding, California.

scopecontent.p: Photocopy letter, with typescript, from Charles A. Carmichael to his brother, 4 pp, 15 November 1850, regarding a trip west and settlement in Oregon. With postscript from another brother, William C. Carmichael.

acqinfo.p: Gift of Mrs. Corinne G. Hofpauir, January 1987.

accessrestrict.p: This collection is open to the public.

userestrict.p: The Oregon Historical Society is the owner of the materials in the Research Library and makes available reproductions for research, publication, and other uses. Written permission must be obtained from the Research Library prior to any use of reproductions. The Society does not necessarily hold copyright to all the materials in the collections. In some cases, permission for use of reproductions may require seeking additional authorization from the copyright holders.

prefercite.p: Charles A. Carmichael letter to his brother, Mss 1500, Oregon Historical Society Research Library.
